content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":246020,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/0dbcf3df-96a0-4ef5-bb42-53599002571f/for integr.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/0dbcf3df-96a0-4ef5-bb42-53599002571f/for integr.PNG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"for integr.PNG\",\"name\":\"for integr.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"0dbcf3df-96a0-4ef5-bb42-53599002571f\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":763,\"height\":157},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Hello and welcome to EPAM – and to our internal company platforms! \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We know moving to a new set of systems and processes can feel like a challenge, but we want to try and make it easy for you! So, we wanted to share a few important actions and tips shared by EPAMers who have gone through this journey before you. Please bookmark this module for your first few days as the links may be useful as we guide you through some of the first things you will see on EPAM’s internal platforms.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Focus for the win\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#995A00\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"It can be tempting to try and do onboarding or other integration tasks while multitasking on a call or when you find a free minute in the middle of something else, but we would ask that you dedicate focus time to onboarding to make sure you complete all the steps.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Setting up\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#995A00\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"You have already received an email around setting up your EPAM email, but please ensure you follow all our security steps in setting up.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Security\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#995A00\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"All EPAM-licensed security software including OPSWAT, 2-FA, Global Protect, and any other security measures laid out in accordance with our EPAM IT security and support teams \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"must \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#A72014\"}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"be downloaded and installed for all users, without exception.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Using our Onboarding system\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#995A00\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Our \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/#/dashboard\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Onboarding Portal\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"is designed for both newcomers and current employees to help with general onboarding to EPAM, new roles, positions or projects by providing targeted materials as well as helping all EPAMers to stay in sync with corporate working conditions, rules, resources and opportunities. \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"When asked to click on links in EPAM Onboarding modules, just click them versus trying to open them in a new tab as this can result in an error.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Email\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#995A00\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We use \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Outlook\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" for email (and Microsoft tools for most other tasks). Now, when you first open your inbox, it may seem slightly overwhelming as we send out regular emails to staff to keep them informed about our processes, latest developments and so on. Our advice is to look at the mails, see what is relevant to you and the systems that you use and what you may need to track production work and administrative tasks. Once you have done that you may wish to set up rules, filters and folders to have a workflow that is optimized for you.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-warning\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"One tip: \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"WFT are automated system notifications and ADPT mails contain information onboarding trainings. Rarely are these urgent but you can receive a number of them, so you may wish to filter these and check them daily. More important mails are normally tagged Org or News.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"There is no formal training for Outlook but \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMADPTFAQ/18.+Outlook+How-Tos\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"this Knowledge Base article\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" contains tips and advice. Advice on email signatures will be given in due course.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"One more important step here is to customize your signature. Please use \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://signature.epam.com/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM Signature Generator\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" for that.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-warning\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"And don't forget about \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-teams/download-app\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Microsoft Teams\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\", an all-in-one collaboration and communication tool in our company.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"separatorBLock\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Support\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#995A00\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If you find that at any point you need an escalation point for issues regarding EPAM access, please contact our IT Support Team via \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"mailto:Support@epam.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Support@epam.com\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". In your email, please indicate you are a newly acquired employee and list your company name along with your current email address. This will help our teams route your issue to the right team. Local IT teams should also be able to assist, especially with any issues around security and ensuring your device has no tools or software that are not compliant with EPAM policies.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
